profile.title: Iprofayile yomsebenzisi
profile.noPrivateKey: Akukho sitshixo sabucala kule sixhobo sokuthumela ngaphandle.
profile.importFailed: Kusilele ukufaka isitshixo (iphasiwedi ayichanekanga okanye ifayile yonakele).
profile.keysRotated: Isibini sezitshixo esitsha senziwe kwaye isitshixo soluntu salayishwa.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Isitshixo sakho sabucala asishiyi esi sixhobo. Thumela ikopi ekhuselweyo ngephasiwedi ukuze uyibuyisele kwesinye isixhobo.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ukwi-Free—sebenzisa iindlela ezikhawulezayo zeLanga/Lenyanga ngezantsi. Nyusela ukuze uvule imixholo engakumbi.
profile.backupDesc: Yenza iibhakaphu ezikhuselweyo ngephasiwedi zezitshixo zakho, uze uzibuyisele kwesinye isixhobo ukuze udibanise.
profile.followHint: Amabali abo aya kuvela kwifeed ethi Ulandelayo ukuba bapapasha kubaphulaphuli ‘Abalandeli’ (okanye ‘Abantu bonke’).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Kukho into engahambanga kakuhle kule ndawo.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Dlulisa iifowuni ezingenayo kunye nemiyalezo kumbhalo kwinombolo yakho yefowuni eqinisekisiweyo okanye i-imeyile. Iifowuni/imiyalezo ephumayo inokonisa inombolo yakho ye-Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha umbhalo okanye igumbi lengxoxo ukuze uqale ukuthetha

status.filesNote: Iifayile eziya kuthi ga kwe-5. Iphela kwiiyure ezingama-24 ngokungagqibekanga.

auth.headline: Umyalezo okhuselekileyo, wehlabathi lonke, ngotoliko lwangoko
auth.description: Ukugcinwa kwemiyalezo ukuya ekupheleni, uguqulelo oluxhaswa yi-AI, imiyalezo enyamalalayo, kunye neefowuni zeentetho/ividiyo.

feature.privacy: Imfihlo kuqala. Idatha yakho, ulawulo lwakho.

auth.desktopTip: Ukwi-desktop? Skena ngethuthi yakho ukuze ufumane usetyenziso.
auth.tip: Ungasebenzisa i-Chatforia kuso nasiphi na isixhobo — okanye khuphela usetyenziso ufumane amava angcono.
auth.scanHint: Skena ukuze ukhuphele usetyenziso okanye uvule kwisikhangeli sakho.

press.title: Ushicilelo
press.boilerplateText: I-Chatforia ngummeli womyalezo okhuselekileyo onotoliko lwangoko kunye nokugcinwa kwemiyalezo ukuya ekupheleni, owenziwe ukunceda iincoko zehlabathi zibe zabucala nezilula.
press.assetsText: Iilogo, izikrini, kunye nemifanekiso yemveliso (iya kufika kungekudala).

careers.title: Imisebenzi
careers.intro: Siliqela elincinci elakha ummeli womyalezo wabucala, wehlabathi. Ukuba ukhathalela ukugcinwa kwemiyalezo, ufikelelo, kunye ne-UX entle, siyakuvuyela ukuva kuwe.
careers.openRoles: Iindawo ezivulekileyo: Ubunjineli (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Imveliso, Inkxaso.
careers.apply: Indlela yokufaka isicelo: Thumela i-CV/ikhonkco zakho ku jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Malunga neChatforia
about.description: I-Chatforia ngummeli womyalezo okhuselekileyo, onolwimi oluninzi, onokugcinwa kwemiyalezo ukuya ekupheleni, utoliko lwangoko, kunye neefowuni zeentetho/ividiyo. Injongo yethu ilula: ukunceda abantu banxibelelane—ngokhuseleko, ngabucala, nangamazwi abo.

values.privacy: Imfihlo kuqala: Ukugcinwa kwemiyalezo ukuya ekupheleni ngokungagqibekanga.
values.access: Ufikelelo kubo bonke: Guqulela iilwimi ezingama-100+ ngokuzenzekelayo.

about.howDescription: Imiyalezo igcinwa kwisixhobo sakho ngaphambi kokuba ishiye. Utoliko, iibhakaphu, kunye nokudibanisa izixhobo kuyilwe ukuze kuncitshiswe oko iiseva zethu zinokukubona.

advertise.title: Thengisa neChatforia
advertise.description: Fikelela kubasebenzisi beenkcoko ngendawo ezibonakalayo, ezikhuselekileyo kophawu. Sinikezela ngeebhanile kwiindawo ezibonakalayo, uxhasi, kunye neepromo zendlu. Ababhalisi bePremium abababoni iintengiso.

adsense.withPubId: Okwangoku sikhonza iintengiso nge Google AdSense. Ukuba ungathanda ukusijolisa ngeGoogle Ads, sebenzisa i-ID yomshicileli {{pubId}} ucele indawo elawulwayo kwizixhobo zethu ngezantsi. Uxhasi oluthe ngqo luyafumaneka—sebenzisa ifom.
adsense.noPubId: Okwangoku sikhonza iintengiso nge Google AdSense. Uxhasi oluthe ngqo luyafumaneka—sebenzisa ifom engezantsi.

advertise.noPlacements: Akukabikho izithuba ezicwangcisiweyo. Zongeze kwi ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Usetyenziso rhoqo kunye nexesha elide lokuhlala kwi-UI yencoko
why.brandSafe: Iifomathi ezikhuselekileyo kophawu; ukunciphisa rhoqo okuzukileyo
why.deals: Izivumelwano ezithe ngqo okanye ngeprogrammatic nge AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Enkosi! Isicelo sakho sithunyelwe. Siza kulandela kungekudala.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvulwa umxumi wakho we-imeyile ukuthumela isicelo…
form.messagePlaceholder: Ujoliso, imihla, ii-KPI, iindawo zokubeka ozithandayo…

upgrade.title: Nyusela
upgrade.subtitle: Vula isicwangciso esikufaneleyo: susa iintengiso nge-Plus, okanye ufumane zonke iimpawu ezinamandla nge-Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Ukuqala
gettingStarted.subtitle: Umtsha kwiChatforia? Esi sikhokelo sikhawulezayo sibonisa ezona zinto zibalulekileyo ukuze uqalise kwimizuzu embalwa.

alert.text: Esi sikhokelo siya kukhula njengoko sikhupha iimpawu ezintsha. Ukuba kukho into engekho, sazise ngo

section2.title: 2) Qalisa ukuhanjisa imiyalezo
section2.item1: Yenza i-DM okanye Iqela uze uthumele umyalezo wakho wokuqala.
section2.item2: Sebenzisa utoliko lwangoko ukuze uthethe iilwimi ezingama-100+.
section2.item3: Zama imiyalezo enyamalalayo kunye neziqinisekiso zokufunda ku Iprofayile → Imfihlo.

section3.title: 3) Yiya phambili
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = ngaphandle kweentengiso, Premium = iimpawu ezizezizo zonke).
section3.item2Part1: Dibanisa izixhobo ezongezelelekileyo uze usete iibhakaphu ezifihlakeleyo ku

account.a: Khuphela usetyenziso okanye sebenzisa iwebhu, cofa “Yenza iakhawunti”, uqinisekise i-imeyile/inombolo yefowuni yakho. Ukubuyisa, sebenzisa “Ulibele iphasiwedi”.

privacy.a: Ewe. Imiyalezo kunye neefowuni zigcinwa ukuya ekupheleni ngokungagqibekanga. Nguwe nodibaniselwano kuphela eninokuyifunda.

translate.a: Vula “Guqulela ngokuzenzekelayo” ku Izicwangciso → Inkangeleko & Ulwimi. Siguqulela kwisixhobo apho kuxhaswayo, kungenjalo sisebenzisa ii-API ezikhuselekileyo ngedatha encinane.

contact.a: Siqhagamshelane ku support@chatforia.com. Bandakanya izikrini kunye nenguqulelo yohlelo lwakho.

intro.body: Lo Mgaqo-nkqubo Wabucala uchaza indlela iChatforia (“thina”, “thina”) eqokelela ngayo, isebenzisa, kwaye yabelana ngayo ngolwazi xa usebenzisa ii-apps neenkonzo zethu. Siyila iChatforia ukuze sinciphise idatha esinokuyibona.

infoWeCollect.title: Ulwazi esiluqokelelaya
infoWeCollect.account: Ulwazi lweakhawunti (umz., i-imeyile/ifowuni) ukwenza nokukhusela iakhawunti yakho.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Umxholo ofihlakeleyo (imiyalezo/iifowuni) ugcinwe ukuya ekupheleni; asinakuwufunda.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Iidayagnostiki/ukusetyenziswa njengeelog yezaphulelo, uhlobo lwesixhobo, okanye uhlalutyo oluncinci ukuphucula ukusebenza.

sharing.title: Ukwabelana
sharing.body: Asithengisi idatha yabucala. Sinokwabelana ngedatha encinci nabenzi beenkonzo (umz., iintshixo zempompo, uhlalutyo) phantsi kwezikontrakthi eziqinileyo.

rights.title: Amalungelo akho
rights.body: Kuxhomekeke kummandla wakho (umz., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), unokucela ukufikelela, ukulungisa, ukucima, okanye ukuphuma kwezinye iindlela zokuqhubekeka. Qhagamshelana: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ugcino lwedatha & ukhuseleko
retention.body: Sigcina kuphela oko kufunekayo ukusebenza kwenkonzo kwaye sisebenzisa ukhuseleko olusemgangathweni weshishini. Umxholo ogcinwe ukuya ekupheleni asinakuwuvula.

children.title: Abantwana
children.body: I-Chatforia ayijoliswanga kubantwana abangaphantsi kwe-13 (okanye njengoko kufunwa ngumthetho wengingqi yakho).

changes.title: Utshintsho
changes.body: Siza kubeka uhlaziyo apha size sihlaziye umhla othi “Igqitywe ukuhlaziywa”.

intro.body: Ngokusebenzisa iChatforia uyavuma le Migaqo. Ukuba awuvumi, nceda ungasebenzisi inkonzo.

accounts.title: Iiakhawunti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nika ulwazi oluchanekileyo uze ugcine amagama okungena ekhuselekile.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Uxanduva lomsebenzi owenziwa kwiakhawunti yakho lukuwe.

acceptableUse.title: Ukusetyenziswa okuvumelekileyo
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Akukho mxholo ongekho mthethweni, onobundlobongela, okanye ophula amalungelo; akukho nkunkuma okanye ukuxhatshazwa okwenziwa ngoomatshini.

yourContent.title: Umxholo wakho
yourContent.body: Usagcina amalungelo omxholo wakho. Usinika amalungelo afunekayo ukuze sisebenzise inkonzo (umz., ukuhambisa, ukugcina, utoliko).

disclaimer.title: Izikhankanyi & uxanduva
disclaimer.body: Inkonzo inikezelwa “njengoko injalo” ngaphandle kweziqinisekiso. Ngokobuninzi bomthetho, iChatforia ayixanduva ngomonakalo ongathanga ngqo okanye olandelwayo.

changes.title: Utshintsho
changes.body: Singahlaziya le migaqo; ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa emva kohlelo kuthetha ukwamkelwa.

doNotSell.title: Musa Ukuthengisa okanye Ukwabelana Ngolwazi Lwam
doNotSell.body: I-Chatforia ayithengisi ulwazi lomntu. Abahlali baseCalifornia basenokungenisa izicelo phantsi kwe-CPRA besebenzisa iqhosha elingezantsi.

cookies.title: Izicwangciso ze-Cookie
cookies.body: I-Chatforia isebenzisa ii-cookie ezimbalwa (umz., iseshoni, ukhuseleko). Asisebenzisi ii-cookie zeentengiso zomntu wesithathu. Lawula ii-cookie kwiisethingi zesikhangeli sakho.
